content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-20.0, -70.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) with iron ore input and iron plate output.
- Furnace at position (-18.0, -70.0) currently lacking ingredients to smelt.

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore.
- Connected to a transport belt network and wooden chests for ore collection.

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) currently out of fuel.
- Transport belts connecting to a wooden chest at position (-12.5, -54.5) for iron ore storage.
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) transferring items between belts and chests.

### Iron Plate Storage and Transfer System at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) transferring items from furnace to chest.

### Miscellaneous Storage and Transfer Systems
- Various wooden chests and burner inserters positioned at different coordinates for resource storage and transfer.
- Multiple belt groups facilitating the movement of resources between different parts of the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters on occupied tiles
- Ensure the target tile for placing an inserter is free from other entities like transport belts. Adjust spacing, direction, or reference position accordingly.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Verify that the required items are available in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities like furnaces or chests.
